channel.title: Bunny Shop causing error-pics
channel.description:
* I am following off of Jeremy368's tutorial on how to make working shops, found here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328858.0.html.*
Under shops.cfg I have the code "shop = 44 1337_Bunny 2 2 7671 100 7461 100 7449 1000 7398" and etc. I have no idea what the first 2 2 mean, couldnt find explanation.
Under autospawn.cfg everything is correct "spawn = 1835 3084 3498 0 0 0 0 0 1."
Under client.java I was told to put the code
if(NPCID == 1835){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; } I put that code between the other "WanneShop" codes.
When everything is put together in the right spots, I compile and run. It loggs in okay but just gives me a black screen. CMD says "NumberFormatException."
So I figure it must be the shops.cfg, just a couple values off right?? So I take the code from shops.cfg out/compile/run it. Everything works fine, just nothing in the Bunny's trade --shown here-- [IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss322/digon_rsbot/Fubergen0008.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss322/digon_rsbot/Fubergen0008.png[/img]
If you know the correction please let me know, and also if you know of one, provide me with a better tut.

item.title: Bunny Shop causing error-pics
item.dc:creator: @digon digon
item.description:
@digon wrote:

Okay, I’ll post exactly what I see in the cmd/ "Loading Proje ct Fubergen Clientv7.3.2/no midi or mp3 files in folder/ Loading custom Sprites part 1/ Loading custom Sprites 2/ headicons_prayer 6.png Skulls Loaded/ Exception in thread “Thread-5” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “%1”/ at java.lang.NumerFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:45)/ at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:449)/ at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(integer.jaba:499)/ at client.orbs(client.java:12029)/ at client.method62(client.java:3484)/ at client.mether7(client.java:2602)/ at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115)/ at client.run(client.java:5190)/ at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

Thats the error in CMD, the “/” are
Im not sure where the NumberFormatException is. Like I said, most likely shops.cfg

BTW my hand fell off from handtyping that whole thing lolz [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 25, 2009, 11:50:06 am[/size][hr]Still open to corrections

Read full topic

item.title: Bunny Shop causing error-pics
item.dc:creator: @digon digon
item.description:
@digon wrote:

  • I am following off of Jeremy368’s tutorial on how to make working shops, found here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328858.0.html.*

Under shops.cfg I have the code “shop = 44 1337_Bunny 2 2 7671 100 7461 100 7449 1000 7398” and etc. I have no idea what the first 2 2 mean, couldnt find explanation.

Under autospawn.cfg everything is correct “spawn = 1835 3084 3498 0 0 0 0 0 1.”

Under client.java I was told to put the code

if(NPCID == 1835){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 44;
} I put that code between the other “WanneShop” codes.

When everything is put together in the right spots, I compile and run. It loggs in okay but just gives me a black screen. CMD says “NumberFormatException.”

So I figure it must be the shops.cfg, just a couple values off right?? So I take the code from shops.cfg out/compile/run it. Everything works fine, just nothing in the Bunny’s trade
–shown here–

If you know the correction please let me know, and also if you know of one, provide me with a better tut.

Read full topic
